proposal1.heroHeadline: Lesia is losing 300 hours a year crafting proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Manually crafting proposals takes hours. With our system, it's a 47-second task.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Each issue below is a direct hit to Lesia's efficiency and bottom line.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Lesia spends 10 hours per proposal. That's 300 hours a year lost. Time that could be spent improving design projects.

problems.title: Missed Deals
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean lost clients. Every day a proposal waits is a day a client might go elsewhere.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manual proposals risk inconsistencies. An off-brand proposal can weaken Lesia's design credibility.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Lesia spends $15,000 annually on proposal preparation. Money that could be invested in design innovations.

problems.title: Stress Factor
problems.description: Proposal writing under tight deadlines causes stress. This stress can diminish creativity in design work.

problems.title: Opportunity Cost
problems.description: Time spent on proposals could be used to secure new clients. This means potential revenue is slipping away.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Here's how our AI system transforms your proposal process.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. With our system, they are ready in under a minute.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual proposals risk off-brand errors. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Lesia's brand.

solutions.title: Cost Efficiency
solutions.description: High labor costs for proposals drain resources. Our system cuts those costs drastically.

solutions.title: Stress Reduction
solutions.description: Proposal deadlines cause stress. Our system's speed and accuracy relieve this burden.

solutions.title: Enhanced Focus
solutions.description: Current processes distract from core design work. Our AI refocuses time on creativity and client engagement.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Lesia's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Lesia around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Lesia.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Experience with Lesia's Design Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We'll transform your digital presence with seamless design and user-focused solutions, ensuring your customers have the best experience.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every day Acme Corp is losing potential customers and revenue due to current website challenges.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Visitors leave your site quickly, costing you potential sales and engagement. This results in a 30% loss of potential leads daily.

problems.title: Slow Load Times
problems.description: Every extra second your page takes to load means losing 7% of possible conversions. This impacts your bottom line significantly.

problems.title: Outdated Design
problems.description: An outdated design makes visitors question your brand's credibility, leading to a 25% drop in potential customer trust.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: Without a mobile-friendly site, 50% of users abandon the page, missing out on a huge chunk of traffic.

problems.title: Inaccessible Content
problems.description: Not all users can access your content easily, causing a 15% loss in user retention and brand loyalty.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: With unclear calls to action, users leave without purchasing, resulting in a 20% loss in revenue opportunities.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Let's tackle these issues head-on with solutions that address each problem directly.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your site with a modern, user-friendly design that retains visitors and builds trust.

solutions.title: Page Speed Optimization
solutions.description: Enhance load times to ensure users stay connected and engaged with your content.

solutions.title: Mobile Optimization
solutions.description: Ensure your site is fully responsive, capturing the growing mobile audience effectively.

solutions.title: Accessibility Improvements
solutions.description: Make your content accessible to all, increasing your reach and user satisfaction.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: At Lesia, we prioritize user experience and design excellence.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: With years of experience, we know what it takes to succeed in design.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We listen to your needs and tailor our services to fit your vision perfectly.

whyUsCards.title: Results-Driven
whyUsCards.description: Our focus is on delivering tangible results that enhance your business.

whyUsCards.title: Open Communication
whyUsCards.description: We keep you informed every step of the way for a smooth collaboration.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the dedicated team behind your success.

team.name: Lesia Payne
team.role: Company Owner And Lead Ux Designer
team.bio: Lesia leads our strategy and client relationships, ensuring every project is a success. With a passion for design, she drives innovation and excellence.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We dive deep into understanding your business and the challenges you face.

process.title: Design & Prototype
process.description: Our team creates initial designs and prototypes, focusing on user experience.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: We build and rigorously test to ensure everything works flawlessly.

process.title: Launch & Optimize
process.description: Your new site goes live, and we continue to refine based on real-world data.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Consider these investment options to elevate your business.

pricing.name: Starter Package
pricing.description: Perfect for small businesses looking to make a big impact.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Our most popular option, offering comprehensive design and support.

pricing.name: Enterprise Package
pricing.description: For large businesses aiming for excellence and innovation.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Let's Transform Your Digital Presence Together.
proposal2.ctaDescription: We're here to chat about your goals and how we can help. No strings attached.
proposal2.footerSub: Designing the future, one experience at a time.

lead.company_description:
We partner for postive change. 

We work with partners whose mission we connect with‚Äîwho are working to make the world better. For the past decade, we have put our time and expertise as designers, developers and UX strategists towards improving our community and giving back wherever we can.

We don't just design websites. We create valuable tools and information that your customers, clients and staff can actually use.

Whether we are doing graphic design or web development, our focus is usability so anyone can find what they are looking for, fast. Putting users first helps them find your website and helps your business grow.

Services include:
Responsive website design
User Experience (UX) design
Wireframing
Art direction
Logo design
Print graphic design
Signage and display design
Business card design
Packaging design
Trade show booth and banner design
Custom web development 
Customized Squarespace Websites
Information Architecture
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
User-testing
Tree testing
QA testing
Website & usability audits
Web applications
Mobile web applications
